segments.text: This house is very nice for me , but I can ’ t afford it in a lump sum .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Don ’ t worry , you can pay in an installment , that is to say , you don ’ t have to pay the whole amount of money at once .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That ’ s good . Will you tell me the details ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Certainly , you need to pay a deposit at first , and you will pay the rest monthly .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I need to talk it over with my wife .
segments.speaker: S1
